StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [M8412_Retrieve_or_Count_Person]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@RCountORList INT =1, @Op.on INT =1, @SSN VARCHAR(9) = NULL, @LastName VARCHAR(20) = NULL, @FirstName VARCHAR(20) = NULL, @UserID varchar(15) AS SET NOCOUNT ON
DECLARE @orgid int DECLARE @orgCnt int
CREATE table #org1(organiza.on_id int) CREATE table #org2(organiza.on_id int) CREATE table #org3(organiza.on_id int)
SET @orgid = 900 /* SET @orgid=0
SELECT @orgid = o.ORGANIZATION_ID FROM RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION o, USER_LIST u WHERE o.MCC_CODE = u.MCC_CODE AND u.USER_ID = @UserID */
IF @orgid > 0 BEGIN
insert into #org1(organiza.on_id) values(@orgid) select @orgCnt = organiza.on_id from #org1 while(@orgCnt > 0) begin insert into #org2(organiza.on_id) select organiza.on_id from #org1
insert into #org3(organiza.on_id) select organiza.on_id from #org1
delete from #org1 insert into #org1(organiza.on_id) select child_organiza.on_id from ORGANIZATION_MAP where parent_organiza.on_id in (select organiza.on_id from #org2) delete from #org2 select @orgCnt = count(*) from #org1 end END
-- ******
DECLARE @SelectStmt VARCHAR(2000), @WhereClause VARCHAR(1000)
SET @WhereClause =''
IF @RCountORList=1 SET @SelectStmt='SELECT COUNT(*) ' ELSE SET @SelectStmt='SELECT p.PERSON_ID, ' + '''XXXXX'' + RIGHT(p.SOCIAL_SECURITY_NUMBER,4) SOCIAL_SECURITY_NUMBER, ' + 'p.FIRST_NAME, p.LEGAL_MIDDLE_NAME, p.LAST_NAME, p.SUFFIX_CD, ' + 'p.LAST_NAME + '', '' + p.FIRST_NAME NAME, ' + 'p.ORGANIZATION_ID, ' + 'r.Current_Loca.on Loca.on, ' + '(case CHARINDEX(''$'', r.Current_Loca.on, 1) WHEN 0 then r.Current_Loca.on else substring(r.Current_Loca.on, CHARINDEX(''$'',r.Current_Loca.on, 1)+1, len(r.Current_Loca.on)-CHARINDEX(''$'', r.Current_Loca.on, 1)) end) Current_Loca.on, ' + 'r.Billet, CONVERT(CHAR(111),r.Date_Billet, 111) Date_Billet'
SET @SelectStmt= @SelectStmt+ ' FROM M8412_Person_View p LEFT OUTER JOIN M8412_Recruit_Person r ' + 'ON p.Person_ID=r.Person_ID'
IF @Op.on = 2 GOTO Search_LastName Else IF @Op.on = 3 GOTO Search_Extend
IF (ISNULL(LEN(@SSN),0)= 0) SET @SSN='@' SET @WhereClause = ' p.SOCIAL_SECURITY_NUMBER=''' + @SSN + '''' GOTO Process_Search
Search_LastName: IF (ISNULL(LEN(@LastName),0)= 0) SET @WhereClause =' p.SOCIAL_SECURITY_NUMBER=''@''' ELSE SET @WhereClause = dbo.sp_Add_And_OR(@WhereClause,'AND') + ' UPPER(p.LAST_NAME) LIKE ''' + UPPER(@LastName) + '%''' GOTO Process_Search
Search_Extend:
IF (ISNULL(LEN(@SSN),0)=0 and ISNULL(LEN(@LastName),0)=0 and ISNULL(LEN(@FirstName),0)=0) SET @WhereClause = ' p.SOCIAL_SECURITY_NUMBER =''@''' ELSE
BEGIN IF (ISNULL(LEN(@SSN), 0) != 0) SET @WhereClause = dbo.sp_Add_And_OR(@WhereClause,'AND ') + 'p.SOCIAL_SECURITY_NUMBER LIKE ''%' + @SSN +'''' IF (ISNULL(LEN(@LastName),0)!= 0) SET @WhereClause = dbo.sp_Add_And_OR(@WhereClause,'AND')+ ' UPPER(p.LAST_NAME) LIKE ''' + UPPER(@LastName) + '%''' IF (ISNULL(LEN(@FirstName), 0) != 0) SET @WhereClause = dbo.sp_Add_And_OR(@WhereClause,'AND')+ ' UPPER(p.FIRST_NAME) LIKE ''' + UPPER(@FirstName) + '%''' END Process_Search: SET @SelectStmt= @SelectStmt+ ' WHERE p.ORGANIZATION_ID IN (select organiza.on_id from #org3) '
IF (ISNULL(LEN(@WhereClause), 0) != 0) -- SET @SelectStmt = @SelectStmt + ' WHERE ' + @WhereClause SET @SelectStmt = @SelectStmt + ' AND ' + @WhereClause
IF @RCountORList <>1 SET @SelectStmt= @SelectStmt+ ' ORDER BY p.LAST_NAME, p.FIRST_NAME, p.LEGAL_MIDDLE_NAME' EXEC (@SelectStmt) --PRINT @SelectStmt
-- select count(*) from #org3 drop table #org1 drop table #org2 drop table #org3
SET NOCOUNT OFF
